item.description:
The rain will have stopped. Saturday will be warm and sunny. It is the night before the start of the 2010 Red Sox Season.

The Herland Brothers are playing at 9:30 pm at Harrington's Food and Spirits in downtown Wakefield. Harrington's is a cozy Irish Restaurant and Pub. We will meet there around 9 pm, put in for a table, have dinner and drinks, enjoy the show and be ready for Opening Day when the clock strikes midnight.

There is free parking in downtown Wakefield in the public lot across from Harrington's and along Water and Main Streets. The location is T accessible by the 136 and 137 Bus from the Orange Line in Malden Center. And Commuter Rail accessible from North Station via the Reading and Haverhill Trains stopping at Wakefield with a less than 10 minute walk up Albion to Main to Water Street.

Please remember to maintain your own cash bar tab and settle with your server.



We hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Wear Red Sox Hats, Ask the Hostess
item.name: Herland Brothers Unplugged at Harrington's Food & Spirits
